title: Expectant mothers can prevent fetal brain problems caused by the flu, study shows

title_detail.value: Expectant mothers can prevent fetal brain problems caused by the flu, study shows

summary: Choline, an essential B vitamin nutrient, can prevent fetal brain developmental problems that often occur after prenatal maternal infections such as colds and influenza (flu), according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Choline, an essential B vitamin nutrient, can prevent fetal brain developmental problems that often occur after prenatal maternal infections such as colds and influenza (flu), according to a new study.
